result.ga: Tá mise i mo chónaí sna Stáit Aontaithe
result.orig: Tá mise i mo chónaí sna Stáit Aontaithe
result.html: Tá mise i mo chónaí sna Stáit AontaitheI live in the USA.
result.ponchtml: Tá mise i mo ċónaí sna Stáit AontaiṫeI live in the USA.

result.eng: I'm originally from New York in the United States.
result.ga: As Nua-Eabhrac sna Stáit Aontaithe ó dhúchas mé
result.orig: As Nua-Eabhrac sna Stáit Aontaithe ó dhúchas mé
result.html: As Nua-Eabhrac sna Stáit Aontaithe ó dhúchas méI'm originally from New York in the United States.
result.ponchtml: As Nua-Eaḃrac sna Stáit Aontaiṫe ó ḋúċas méI'm originally from New York in the United States.

result.eng: Two jets flew in from the United States.
result.ga: D'eitil dhá scairdeitleán isteach ó na Stáit Aontaithe
result.orig: D'eitil dhá scairdeitleán isteach ó na Stáit Aontaithe
result.html: D'eitil dhá scairdeitleán isteach ó na Stáit AontaitheTwo jets flew in from the United States.
result.ponchtml: D'eitil ḋá scairdeitleán isteaċ ó na Stáit AontaiṫeTwo jets flew in from the United States.

result.eng: We were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.
result.ga: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit Aontaithe
result.orig: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit Aontaithe
result.html: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit AontaitheWe were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí aíonna le ḃeiṫ ag teaċt isteaċ as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit AontaiṫeWe were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.

result.eng: Clearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
result.ga: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóir
result.orig: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóir
result.html: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóirClearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir go raiḃ Stáit Aontaiṫe Ṁeiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollṁóirClearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.

result.eng: By the year 1776 slavery was ended in many of the northern states.
result.ga: Faoin mbliain 1776 bhí deireadh le sclábhaíocht i roinnt de na stáit thuaidh
result.orig: Faoin mbliain 1776 bhí deireadh le sclábhaíocht i roinnt de na stáit thuaidh
result.html: Faoin mbliain 1776 bhí deireadh le sclábhaíocht i roinnt de na stáit thuaidhBy the year 1776 slavery was ended in many of the northern states.
result.ponchtml: Faoin mbliain 1776 ḃí deireaḋ le scláḃaíoċt i roinnt de na stáit ṫuaiḋBy the year 1776 slavery was ended in many of the northern states.

result.eng: As the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ga: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.orig: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.html: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíochtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ponchtml: Mar a leaṫ an tír siar amaċ ṫáinig níos mó stáit isteaċ san aontaċt nár ġlac le scláḃaíoċtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.

result.eng: By 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
result.ga: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit Aontaithe
result.orig: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit Aontaithe
result.html: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit AontaitheBy 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
result.ponchtml: Faoi 1865 ḃí úinéaraċt daoine in aġaiḋ an dlí in gaċ ceann de na Stáit AontaiṫeBy 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
